com.xtend.coap.message.request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xtend.coap.message.Message
      • com.xtend.coap.message.request.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteRequest, GetRequest, PostRequest, PutRequest

    public class Request
extends Message
    Class that represents a Request.
    Version:
    Xtend-CoAP_v1.0.
    Author:
    César Estebas Gómez.

        public void handleResponse(Response response)

        response - The response to handle
